document.full_text: the secretary of the navy issued censure letters on friday to four high-ranking officers over a series of raunchy videos shown to thousands of sailors aboard the aircraft carrier enterprise.
document.title: south: virginia: navy officers censured for raunchy videos
lines_and_colors: the secretary of the navy issued censure letters on friday to four high-ranking officers over a series of raunchy videos shown to thousands of sailors aboard the aircraft carrier enterprise.
